item.title: Our guide to the 2018 awards season contenders (Part 1)
item.author: Ashley Luckyram,
item.description: Fall festival season is over, trailers for the final films of the year have dropped, and prestige pictures are beginning to roll out their wide releases left, right, and centre. You guessed it: it’s awards season. While there are strong arguments to made that artworks shouldn’t really be compared in …

item.title: Moving on from Daniel: where do we go now?
item.author: Ashley Luckyram,
item.description: As he named The Master the best film of 2012, Peter Bradshaw of The Guardian labelled the anticipation around the release of a Paul Thomas Anderson film as “event cinema”, only comparable to the legend surrounding the great Stanley Kubrick. America’s newest master’s latest, esoterically titled …
